notifications_description: When an action happens in any of the organizations or apps that you are a member of you will be notified. You can manage your personal notification settings and turn on/off notifications on specific platform entities.
your_user_id_description: This is your user id within your Agnost Enterprise Cluster.
your_name_description: Please enter your full name, or a display name you are comfortable with.
your_email_description: This is your visible email within the platform. You can also use your email when signing in to the platform.
your_password_description: You use your email and password to login to Agnost cluster.
your_avatar_description: This is your team's avatar. Click on the avatar to upload a custom one from your files. An avatar is optional but strongly recommended.
delete_account_description: Permanently remove your Organization and all of its apps and associated app data from deployed environments. This action is not reversible â€” please continue with caution.
